name: Floating Product Category for WooCommerce
author: userelements

sections.description:
Categorise to make your products easier to find (search for) and discover (stumble across). Nest categories in sub-categories, no theme changes or coding needed. Sticky category for WooCommerce that will improve customer buying experience and increase conversions.

Features And Options:

  • Fully Customizable
    • Choose category & sub category
    • Display product count
    • Customize color
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder after extracting it to the “/wp-content/plugins/(the folder of the extracted plugin)” directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance > Customizer > Floating Product Category to make your changes.
